story:
Aims...

We aim to raise £500 by tackling the Gung-ho 5k assault course on the 29th of August this year at Aintree race course. Every £100 raised will keep the service running for one more month and provide a place for anyone who has experienced bereavement. 

Local Bereavement Support

By its very nature death is distressing to everyone. The emotional and physical reactions that follow are usually intense, and may confuse or cause fear and shock. You may experience reactions that are unfamiliar and seemingly out of character, either in yourself or others.

Grief is unique, and as individual as those experiencing it, how we cope varies too. Sometimes it can help to express your feelings and share experiences by talking to others.  Talking to others who face similar difficulties even if their experience is not the same can be helpful. Offloading feelings in a safe environment can be easier than coping alone.

Sometimes it is easier to talk to someone outside our own circle of family and friends, sharing memories, good and bad, with someone who is able to listen.

The Bereavement Support Group is for anyone who has been bereaved. 

CAYP is unique in the service offered.

Adult and Children and Young Peoples bereavement support groups meet on the same night in separate rooms of the same venue. Individual bereavement support sessions and telephone support are also available by arrangement.

CAYP is a bereavement support charity and we rely on donations to continue and expand the support we offer.


Children and Young People Bereavement Support group.

Founded by families who had nowhere to turn when supporting Children and Young People following a sudden death and designed in consultation with local children and young people

The group will provide a safe place to express thoughts and feelings at what can be a sad and frightening time.

Often it can help to meet with others in similar situations to yourself and share experiences in a safe and relaxed environment tailored to children and young people.

The service offers a safe environment, where children and young people can explore how they feel in a caring and non-judgemental environment.

Remember -

  • You are not alone in your thoughts and feelings
  • The things you are feeling are normal
  • The CAYP team are here to listen and support you
  • You are encouraged to talk about your loss and how this is impacting on your life
  • You will have the opportunity to meet other children and young people with similar experiences

Our Aims

  • To support children and young people develop the confidence and skills to consider their emotions and express themselves
  • To help them understand and express their grief and loss in practical and creative ways
  • To encourage them to talk openly about their thoughts, feelings and behaviour
  • To support them to work through painful issues
  • Be able to change approach, meeting each child and young person’s individual needs, on their own journey
  • To encourage children and young people to respect and learn from others with similar experiences without judgement

Who facilitates the meetings:

CAYP staff and volunteers are all fully trained bereavement support staff / volunteers (CRB, Safe Guarding, Child Protection & Governance).

Are you recently bereaved & would like to:

Know that you are not alone in your thoughts & feelings?

Know you are coping & the things you are feeling are normal?

Learn more about yourself awareness during difficult times?

Then come along to our bereavement support group, held on the 1st Thursday of each month at:

Community Learning Centre
Alan Kelly Stand
Preston North End football ground
Deepdale Road 
PR1 6RU

6pm - 7.30pm

Often it can help to meet with others in similar circumstances by sharing your experiences in a safe environment.

Please ring 01772 523730 to confirm your attendance or for more information

We are a small group all of whom have suffered a bereavement. The meetings are informal with a topic to focus on  then opportunity for peer support through free discussion. There is also the opportunity for individual bereavement support sessions and telephone support to be arranged

http://www.lancsteachinghospitals.nhs.uk/cayp

Charity number - 1051194
story_txt:
Aims...
We aim to raise £500 by tackling the Gung-ho 5k assault course on the 29th of August this year at Aintree race course. Every £100 raised will keep the service running for one more month and provide a place for anyone who has experienced bereavement. 

Local Bereavement Support


By its very nature death is distressing to everyone. The emotional and physical reactions that follow are usually intense, and may confuse or cause fear and shock. You may experience reactions that are unfamiliar and seemingly out of character, either in yourself or others.
Grief is unique, and as individual as those experiencing it, how we cope varies too. Sometimes it can help to express your feelings and share experiences by talking to others.  Talking to others who face similar difficulties even if their experience is not the same can be helpful. Offloading feelings in a safe environment can be easier than coping alone.
Sometimes it is easier to talk to someone outside our own circle of family and friends, sharing memories, good and bad, with someone who is able to listen.
The Bereavement Support Group is for anyone who has been bereaved. 
CAYP is unique in the service offered.
Adult and Children and Young Peoples bereavement support groups meet on the same night in separate rooms of the same venue. Individual bereavement support sessions and telephone support are also available by arrangement.
CAYP is a bereavement support charity and we rely on donations to continue and expand the support we offer.


Children and Young People Bereavement Support group.
Founded by families who had nowhere to turn when supporting Children and Young People following a sudden death and designed in consultation with local children and young people
The group will provide a safe place to express thoughts and feelings at what can be a sad and frightening time.
Often it can help to meet with others in similar situations to yourself and share experiences in a safe and relaxed environment tailored to children and young people.
The service offers a safe environment, where children and young people can explore how they feel in a caring and non-judgemental environment.   
Remember -

You are not alone in your thoughts and feelings
The things you are feeling are normal
The CAYP team are here to listen and support you
You are encouraged to talk about your loss and how this is impacting on your life
You will have the opportunity to meet other children and young people with similar experiences

Our Aims

To support children and young people develop the confidence and skills to consider their emotions and express themselves
To help them understand and express their grief and loss in practical and creative ways
To encourage them to talk openly about their thoughts, feelings and behaviour
To support them to work through painful issues
Be able to change approach, meeting each child and young person’s individual needs, on their own journey
To encourage children and young people to respect and learn from others with similar experiences without judgement

Who facilitates the meetings:
CAYP staff and volunteers are all fully trained bereavement support staff / volunteers (CRB, Safe Guarding, Child Protection & Governance).
Are you recently bereaved & would like to:
Know that you are not alone in your thoughts & feelings?
Know you are coping & the things you are feeling are normal?
Learn more about yourself awareness during difficult times?
Then come along to our bereavement support group, held on the 1st Thursday of each month at:
Community Learning CentreAlan Kelly StandPreston North End football groundDeepdale Road PR1 6RU
6pm - 7.30pm
Often it can help to meet with others in similar circumstances by sharing your experiences in a safe environment.
Please ring 01772 523730 to confirm your attendance or for more information
We are a small group all of whom have suffered a bereavement. The meetings are informal with a topic to focus on  then opportunity for peer support through free discussion. There is also the opportunity for individual bereavement support sessions and telephone support to be arranged
http://www.lancsteachinghospitals.nhs.uk/cayp
Charity number - 1051194

story:
We are raising funds to solve our schools biggest expense - TRANSPORT 


Through the incredible generosity of friends and family, we have already managed to raise US$6,400!! However for a quality second-hand van we still need your help.



Transporting the kids 

Each day we have to rent a Matatu (a taxi van, common for public transport throughout East Africa). They are notoriously dangerous with often fatigued, unlicensed drivers who drive recklessly and extremely fast. It’s like the African version of Russian Roulette! Even last month we lost a friend in a head on collision as she travelled to her school. The leading cause of death in Kenya is by no surprise; motor vehicle accidents.  

Our temporary school is located in the town of Mtwapa, a 30 min drive from Mombasa City. This place is widely recognised as the child prostitution capital of Africa. Walking is not a viable option, as the children live far from the school, they would have to pass dangerous neighbourhoods and are very young. We need all of our kids to arrive at school safely and have a safe journey back home. To do this we desperately need your help!   



Transporting materials

We have researched and analysed the capital funding required for developing our new school and one thing remains very clear - transport of materials would be an enormous expense. Many of the materials we require to start construction at our new site are very affordable by western standards. However because the new site is reasonably rural and remote, transport costs for materials would mean less money invested into classrooms and school facilities. The best way we can help solve this is  transporting goods and materials ourselves! A van therefore can act as our school bus for students and then (with the seats folded or removed) can also be our delivery solution. With ample space, we can save tens of thousands in delivery charges! 


What's our story?

 My partner Lindsay started her work in Kenya, volunteering for an orphanage in Mombasa in 2013. Full of ideas and driven to make a difference, she became frustrated with the inefficient management and decided to break off and start her own school. I met Lindsay while travelling, after more than 10 years working as a ranger for national parks in Australia. 

With my background being in  environmental science, sustainable land management and permaculture, I was looking for a way to use  the knowledge and skills to help others. Our ideas quickly merged into what is now Eco Moyo Education Centre.

Ultimately, we want to see entire communities live sustainably and produce healthy food, by introducing concepts for self-reliance and sustainable land management. Once the stomach is full, the mind becomes hungry. This is where our school comes in, focusing on holistic education for both children and youths as well as adults.





Current Setup

We are a PRIVATE, NO FEE SCHOOL with 21 students in a mix of Kindergarten and Primary levels. Our paid staff consists of 3 teachers, a chef and a watchman. 

Together with our amazing Kenyan team, we are bringing education to the poorest of the poor thanks to our donor’s generous monthly contributions. Although primary education has been free in Kenya since 2003, free isn’t exactly free. There are still text books, transport, food and other expenses that mean many children are left behind.  


Everything from the teachers salaries and rent to students medical bills and 3 meals a day are covered by these donations reaching roughly 1300 AUD per month.However, we are not planning on begging for donations year after year and are currently in the process of developing several businesses, the major one being a commercial aquaponic system (breeding fish and growing veggies in one system without soil and only recycled water). Income from this could eventually cater for running costs of our whole centre.  


We want to prepare our students by developing their minds to face a challenging future. Statistically, few will find paid employment after they leave school, so it’s important for us to encourage and foster creativity, motivation and initiative. This is why unlike most schools, we offer many extra curricular subjects such as Art, Music, and Gardening while nurturing technical skills. We want our students to have the skills and ability to create their own job opportunities in the future.


Our BIG Plan

Just recently we purchased a 10 acre property for our new school location in the rural outskirts of Kilifi town. The property has ample space for a much larger school,  growing our own produce and demonstrating cost-effective, simple sustainable-living concepts. We believe that the permaculture system of integrating human needs into the living ecology of our natural environment is the only way forward for humanity on this earth. And the best way to prove this, is by walking the talk.



Want to know more? Please check out our awesome web page www.ecomoyo.com. 

Or like and follow us on Facebook! Eco Moyo Facebook 


What We Need & What You Get


Your donation will enable us to purchase a second hand van and have it safety inspected and insured ready to be put to work! Our research in Kenya and online has found we would be able to purchase a 5-7 year old vehicle with low kms. 

Through the incredible generosity of friends and family, we have already managed to raise US$6,400!!


Here is a breakdown of our budget: 


 

An example of the type of vehicle we are looking for:




If we don’t reach our goal, all funds will still be set aside to purchase our school bus in the not too distant future. 

If we succeed and surpass our goal ...well that’s just AMAZING! 


The Impact

 For the students safety and for us to grow and move forward to reach our goals, transport is vital. Currently the student’s transport to the school costs us 20,000 shillings per month (roughly $US200). This is an enormous expense for us and second only to the teacher’s salaries. For materials and errands, the school’s current transport solution is a motorbike (or piki piki) which we bought last year to save us money on local taxi’s. To gather materials and supplies we have a tomato crate strapped to the back!  Our little workhorse has taken us everywhere and been an enormous help to the project but as we grow, it’s fast proving to be inadequate.

Your contribution will enable not only safe and reliable transport for our students but also enable us to boldly enter the next chapter of our project and develop our new school. 



Other Ways You Can Help

So that's our story in a nut shell! We really hope you can help us reach our goal!

Even if you can't contribute towards our school bus, there are still many ways you can help.

The best way?... 

Please share this link far and wide ,and make some noise about our campaign! Use the Indiegogo share tools to post our cause all over the place. 

Lastly and from the bottom of our hearts... 

An enormous THANK YOU for helping us. We have big dreams and ambitious goals and we need ALL the help we can get!

Kind Regards

All of us at Eco Moyo

story:
"A word after a word after a word is power."

                        Margaret Atwood "Spelling"

Writing is one of the most important communication skills, but it must be developed through teaching and resources. As a graduate student in English, a college level writing teacher, and a writing studio tutor, I have seen even those students with ample resources struggle to gain an understanding of grammar, cohesion, structure, etc. 

Unfortunately, many women living in shelters are not given resources to learn how to communicate effectively through writing, an ability that is necessary when entering the workplace. I believe the solution is a free online writing studio, available to women's shelters across the U.S.A. (eventually the world), bringing the resources to them. 

Writing studios and centers have traditionally been founded in university, and sometimes high school, settings. I believe that this is no longer necessary. It's time to make writing studios more accessible to different communities, specifically to women in need.  

Within a year, I plan for The Women's Online Writing Studio to go the route of a non-profit organization. However, these are just the beginning stages, and I need help to get the initial website off the ground. For that purpose, I have set our initial funding goal at $4,000 dollars, this will be enough to get the website started as well as to make purchases, like PCs and Chromebooks, that will contribute toward communications with shelters across the country. This money will also help with the initial stage of grant writing.  

Over the years, I have studied and researched writing centers and studios extensively, attending and presenting at academic conferences. Bringing writing studios into the nonprofit sector will help to bridge a massive gap between privately and publicly available education. For women in shelters, this will help to prepare them for employment and/or higher education through professional writing workshops and tutoring sessions. 

Of course, this endeavor is not without its risks and challenges. As a free resource operating based on volunteer work, it will be difficult to coordinate, let alone launch. However, with proper funding and networking made possible by your contributions, I plan to have the website online by January, 2016. 


Thank you all so much for your support! And remember, even if you can't contribute monetarily at this time, you can still share this Indiegogo campaign on your Facebook and Twitter pages. 

Find us on Facebook to learn more about the ways that you can contribute.

story:
Arizona Doug DoucheBAG may hate education, but that doesn't mean YOU have to! He may have gutted funding for education while dumping money into private prisons, he may be ALEC's little pony boy, he may be plotting to keep all the boys and girls uneducated for his sinister Dr. Evil plan to have future workers for his ice cream shops... BUT Arizona ranks dead last in teacher pay and classroom spending, so it's time for a new reusable Doug DoucheBAG!

Why is such a bag important?

We want everyone across the state to see how our Governor is hurting students, teachers, schools, universities and the future of our state.

  • Ducey is no patriot. He consistently disregards Arizona's Constitution. What part of "as free as possible" does he not understand?
  • Under Ducey's leadership, we've seen the largest cuts to state universities - why educate when we can incarcerate?
  • With Ducey's model, orange is the new diploma
  • We believe Doug's #OpportunityForAll should be rephrased to #Opportunity4AllRichWhiteFolks
  • Private prisons + private education = Opportunity 4 All Rich White Folks
  • AZ's achievement gap is really an opportunity gap. If you're poor or brown, good luck finding educational opportunities.
  •  Arizona is dead last in per pupil funding for K-12. And we have some of the highest rates of childhood poverty in the country. Unacceptable.
  •  Ducey has decided OUR students are worth $4,000 less than the rest of this country's kids. (we pay $4,000 less/pupil than the nat'l average on K-12 education).
  • The Governor spends thousands more for his kids at a private school than what we spend on public education. Why are his kids worth more than ours?

How can you help?

  • Our goal is to get as many of these bags made as possible, so every little bit will help. If you can't financially contribute, please share this campaign with all of your friends and family and through social media channels.
  • Please remember to VOTE in the next election cycle.
  • We will be selling the Doug DoucheBAGS to simply cover our costs. 100% of proceeds raised after our costs are met will be donated directly to several local schools who could use some extra funds to help assist them with the great work they're doing.
Our website www.dougdoucheBAG.com will soon be live. You will be able to purchase the other Doug DoucheBAGS we create as well as find info on how you can make a change and get involved. The first in our series, the 'I Hate the Environment' Doug DoucheBAG will be delivered mid-month.

story:
Inspiring Families Through Breakthrough Wealth, Health and Spiritual Education!!

Hello beautiful families! We are Founder + Co-Founders of Beaut Lifestyle Charlotte Howard and Sonya Davis. We are Breakthrough Health and Wealth Mentors from the beautiful Palmetto state of South Carolina. We are super excited to share our latest journey with you.

We’ve just finalized all of the details for our first beaut lifestyle project 100k signature retreat entitled Beaut Lifestyle Health And Wealth Mastery Retreat for Women.


During this retreat you will hear of our challenges we have faced as entrepreneurial women and strategies for overcoming your struggles. We have put our heart and soul into this women retreat as we do with all of our beaut lifestyle projects.


We have to admit, this project has been a very emotional and rewarding journey for us! We are very eager to empower you to easily increase your wealth, health and spiritual growth.

We feel that Beaut Lifestyle project 100k will be a huge success with your help in making a difference. It is our hope that you see our vision and passion for helping others as much as we do!

We kindly present to you Beaut Lifestyle Project 100k. 

Beaut Lifestyle Project 100k is a brilliant philanthropy movement that empowers families to achieve breakthrough wealth, health and spiritual growth in record time. Through the power of education, this project appeals to and empowers families to create more freedom in their lives doing what they love. 

We believe this project will highly impact the lives of families creating a unique restoration culture, which will allow families to heal and achieve goals in all areas of their lives.



We understand that times are changing faster than ever. People are looking for stable incomes but job security is declining at record speed. In the workplace a lot of people are being overworked and underpaid on jobs they don't even have a passion for. People want more freedom to do what they truly love and we want to help.

With the shift in our economy many families are taking control of their lives by becoming entrepreneurs and connecting with communities that can lead them to wealth, health and spiritual growth. This project gathers today's top experts and thought leaders to empower families to heal and achieve goals in all areas of their lives. Families can now put an end to all their wealth, health and spiritual struggles. The key to freedom is right here and there are no limits.


About Charlotte

Charlotte Howard is a single mom of four kids. She is an Ex-Beauty Salon Manager who use to work 80 hours a week. She was diagnosed with Carpal Tunnel Syndrome after working long hours in Corporate America. She left Corporate America to improve her health and stability for her family. Since leaving Corporate America, she has been able to replace her hair styling income working part-time hours around the needs of her family.

She is on track to match her hair styling, publishing and mentorship programs combined income by the end of this year. She is an accomplished Award-Winning Hair Artist + Breakthrough Health + Wealth Mastery Mentor + Best Selling Book Expert publishing over 40 International Best Selling Book Titles. On a mission to continue empowering people to create a renewed sense of energy + motivation for enhancing their lives, Charlotte is here to help YOU!

About Sonya

Pastor Apostle Prophetess Sonya Nicole Davis is a Woman of God that will and can reach many depths to preach the Gospel of Jesus Christ. The anointing that has been placed on her life has allowed God to do a miraculous and a quick work through ministry. Pastor Davis is originally from New York and has traveled the world through her career in the United States Air Force. After her tour ended she returned to Charleston, SC to be closer to family.

She became a member of H.O.P.E New Horizon Baptist Church Inc., in April of 2012, which then led to her ordination of Prophetess in May 2012. Through her obedience Prophetess Davis became the Associate Pastor within the same year. The Glory of God shines brightly within this vessel for Christ. It has taken her to many levels of acceleration. She is now ordained as an Apostle where she currently presides.

Apostle Davis has not only excelled in ministry but in her personal life as well. She has received a Degree in Cosmetology (Dec. 1999), an Associate in Applied Science for General Business-Small Business/Entrepreneurship (April 2013), an Associate in for Paralegal (Dec. 2014). She was also able to add to her double major two certificates in Advance Expert Computer Technology from Trident Technical College.

Sonya Davis is the CEO of Image Beauty Consultants and an expert in the Cosmetology industry. Her professional career spans over a decade. Ms. Davis is a mother of a daughter in college for nursing. Ms. Davis is still continuing her education and currently pursuing her Masters in Christian Counseling.

She is Beaut Lifestyle Co-Founder. She is a member of the Hair Artist Association. She is all about empowering people to enhance their lives mentally, physically, spiritually and financially.

The Project

Beaut Lifestyle Project 100k will address ongoing struggles families are facing mentally, physically, spiritually and financially plus strategies they can utilize to overcome them.

Here is a recent clip of our latest book project dedicated to empowering women entitled “Success in Beauty: The Secrets to Effortless Fulfillment and Happiness : This book empowers women to:


• Create a life filled with fulfillment and happiness
• Create an abundant and happy life they love
• Enhance their mind, body and soul
• Put an end to their personal, business and life struggles
• Take immediate action on pursuing and achieving their ideal goals, passions and dreams



Our Plans:

We have a one-year plan that is simple and proven to impact the lives of families all over the world. Beaut Lifestyle first women retreat will be held in Myrtle Beach September 18-20 2015! We want to create beautiful transformation materials which will be received well by families that are struggling, plus tour cities to educate and promote the projects. We would also like to create documentary films.


To bring more inspiration to families, We want to create an inspirational Ecommerce store. Our team will carefully handcraft beautiful customized items such as necklaces, bracelets, t-shirts, journals, and vision boards that include beaut lifestyle positive affirmations that families can use to be inspired daily.

Most importantly, we want to continue empowering, inspiring and growing this movement both online and offline. We’ll continue to build buzz via local and online media campaigns devoted to transforming the lives of families all around the world.


$10,000+ Complete Beaut Lifestyle Book Series

$4,000+ Marketing Campaigns

$1,000+ Beaut Lifestyle Ecommerce Store Launch

$10,000+ Beaut Lifestyle health and wealth breakthrough kits for families in need


Goals for next few years:

We want this movement to empower, inspire and grow exponentially. We want to enhance Beaut Lifestyle projects by adding a brilliant certification mentorship program where we can develop a global movement that will teach families how to utilize their god given talents and create more freedom in their lives!

SUPPORT:

We hope that you will support us in our mission to make a difference in the lives of families! We hope you want to see us succeed as health and wealth breakthrough mentors because you love our mission, but we also hope you give to reap the many heart felt rewards we have created exclusively for you.

We are super excited to announce that we’ve included an amazing opportunity for you to appear on our TV commercial live with us right here in South Carolina, a professional commercial shoot that thousands of families will see.

We will keep you updated consistently on our progress. We are working on strategies daily to get people involved with this movement. We will be hosting TV segments, radio segments, contests and so much more.

So please, stay connected with us!!


We want to also send a BIG Heartfelt THANK YOU to you for taking out the time to consider our project. We appreciate your love and support!!


Live life, love fully and laugh often!

With Love,

Beaut Lifestyle Team – Charlotte Howard, Sonya Davis, & Daija Howard

story_txt:
Inspiring Families Through Breakthrough Wealth, Health and Spiritual Education!!
Hello beautiful families! We are Founder + Co-Founders of Beaut Lifestyle Charlotte Howard and Sonya Davis. We are Breakthrough Health and Wealth Mentors from the beautiful Palmetto state of South Carolina. We are super excited to share our latest journey with you. We’ve just finalized all of the details for our first beaut lifestyle project 100k signature retreat entitled Beaut
Lifestyle Health And Wealth Mastery Retreat for Women. During this retreat you will hear of our challenges we have faced as entrepreneurial women and strategies for overcoming your struggles. We have put our heart and soul into this women retreat as we do with all of our beaut lifestyle projects.

We have to admit, this project has been a very emotional and rewarding journey for us! We are very eager to empower you to easily increase your wealth, health and spiritual growth. We feel that Beaut Lifestyle project 100k will be a huge success with your help in making a difference. It is our hope that you see our vision and passion for helping others as much as we do!
We kindly present to you Beaut Lifestyle Project 100k. 
Beaut Lifestyle Project 100k is a brilliant philanthropy movement that empowers families to achieve breakthrough wealth, health and spiritual growth in record time. Through the power of education, this project appeals to and empowers families to create more freedom in their lives doing what they love. 
We believe this project will highly impact the lives of families creating a unique restoration culture, which will allow families to heal and achieve goals in all areas of their lives. 
We
understand that times are changing  faster than ever. People are
looking for stable incomes but job security is declining at record
speed.  In the workplace a lot of people are being overworked and
underpaid on jobs they don't even have a passion for. People want
more freedom to do what they truly love and we want to help. 

With the
shift in our economy many families are taking control of their lives
by becoming entrepreneurs and connecting with communities that can
lead them to wealth, health and spiritual growth.
This project  gathers today's top experts and thought leaders to
empower families to heal and achieve goals in all areas of their
lives. Families can now put an end to all their wealth, health and
spiritual struggles. The key to freedom is right here and there are
no limits.



About
Charlotte Charlotte
Howard is a single mom of four kids. She is an Ex-Beauty Salon
Manager who use to work 80 hours a week. She was diagnosed with
Carpal Tunnel Syndrome after working long hours in Corporate America.
She left Corporate America to improve her health and stability for
her family. Since leaving Corporate America, she has been able to
replace her hair styling income working part-time hours around the
needs of her family.
She
is on track to match her hair styling, publishing and mentorship
programs combined income by the end of this year. She is an
accomplished Award-Winning Hair Artist + Breakthrough Health + Wealth
Mastery Mentor + Best Selling Book Expert publishing over 40
International Best Selling Book Titles. On a mission to continue
empowering people to create a renewed sense of energy + motivation
for enhancing their lives, Charlotte is here to help YOU! 

About
SonyaPastor
Apostle Prophetess Sonya Nicole Davis is a Woman of God that will and
can reach many depths to preach the Gospel of Jesus Christ. The
anointing that has been placed on her life has allowed God to do a
miraculous and a quick work through ministry.  Pastor Davis is
originally from New York and has traveled the world through her
career in the United States Air Force. After her tour ended she
returned to Charleston, SC to be closer to family.
She
became a member of H.O.P.E New Horizon Baptist Church Inc., in April
of 2012, which then led to her ordination of Prophetess in May 2012. 
Through her obedience Prophetess Davis became the Associate Pastor
within the same year. The Glory of God shines brightly within this
vessel for Christ.  It has taken her to many levels of acceleration. 
She is now ordained as an Apostle where she currently presides.

Apostle
Davis has not only excelled in ministry but in her personal life as
well.  She has received a Degree in Cosmetology (Dec. 1999), an
Associate in Applied Science for General Business-Small
Business/Entrepreneurship (April 2013), an Associate in for Paralegal
(Dec. 2014).  She was also able to add to her double major two
certificates in Advance Expert Computer Technology from Trident
Technical College.

Sonya
Davis is the CEO of Image Beauty Consultants and an expert in the
Cosmetology industry.  Her professional career spans over a decade. 
Ms. Davis is a mother of a daughter in college for nursing.  Ms.
Davis is still continuing her education and currently pursuing her
Masters in Christian Counseling.

She
is Beaut Lifestyle Co-Founder. She is a member of the Hair Artist
Association. She is all about empowering people to enhance their
lives mentally, physically, spiritually and financially.



The
Project

Beaut
Lifestyle Project 100k will address ongoing struggles families are
facing mentally, physically, spiritually and financially plus
strategies they can utilize to overcome them.

Here
is a recent clip of our latest book project dedicated to empowering
women entitled “Success
in Beauty: The Secrets to Effortless Fulfillment and Happiness
:
This book empowers women to:
•
Create a life filled with fulfillment and happiness• Create an
abundant and happy life they love• Enhance their mind, body and
soul• Put an end to their personal, business and life
struggles• Take immediate action on pursuing and achieving
their ideal goals, passions and dreams

Our
Plans:

We have a one-year
plan that is simple and proven to impact the lives of families all
over the world. Beaut Lifestyle first women retreat will be held in
Myrtle Beach September 18-20 2015! We want to create beautiful
transformation materials which will be received well by families that
are struggling, plus tour cities to educate and promote the projects.
We would also like to create documentary films.



To
bring more inspiration to families, We want to create an
inspirational Ecommerce store. Our team will carefully handcraft
beautiful customized items such as necklaces, bracelets, t-shirts,
journals, and vision boards that include beaut lifestyle positive
affirmations that families can use to be inspired daily.

Most
importantly, we want to continue empowering, inspiring and growing
this movement both online and offline. We’ll continue to build buzz
via local and online media campaigns devoted to transforming the
lives of families all around the world.


$10,000+
Complete Beaut Lifestyle Book Series
$4,000+
Marketing Campaigns
$1,000+
Beaut Lifestyle Ecommerce Store Launch
$10,000+
Beaut Lifestyle health and wealth breakthrough kits for families in
need

Goals
for next few years:

We want this
movement to empower, inspire and grow exponentially. We want to
enhance Beaut Lifestyle projects by adding a brilliant certification
mentorship program where we can develop a global movement that will
teach families how to utilize their god given talents and create more
freedom in their lives!
SUPPORT:
We
hope that you will support us in our mission to make a difference in
the lives of families! We hope you want to see us succeed as health
and wealth breakthrough mentors because you love our mission, but we
also hope you give to reap the many heart felt rewards we have
created exclusively for you. 

We
are super excited to announce that we’ve included an amazing
opportunity for you to appear on our TV commercial live with us right
here in South Carolina, a professional commercial shoot that
thousands of families will see.




We will keep you
updated consistently on our progress. We are working on strategies
daily to get people involved with this movement. We will be hosting
TV segments, radio segments, contests and so much more. 


So please, stay
connected with us!!

We want to also send
a BIG Heartfelt THANK YOU to you for taking out the time to consider
our project. We appreciate your love and support!!


Live life, love
fully and laugh often!With Love,


Beaut Lifestyle Team
– Charlotte Howard, Sonya Davis, & Daija Howard

story:
The BOF was started by Frankie Olvera. He wanted to be able to help others who are dealing with cancer. Please help us raise funds to help more families.

The BOF was started by Frankie Olvera after his cancer diagnosis; he wanted to be able to help others who are dealing with cancer in their daily lives. We are in the process of raising funds for our 501c status so that we can apply for and receive grants to be able to help more families.

www.bofmovement.com


What we need the money for:

*The cost of the 501c is $850

*Posters and informational materials $400.00

*BOF T- Shirts and Art prints $500.00

*Totes for gift packs for children in the hospital $100.00

*Items for the totes: T-shirts, Coloring books, crayons, books, gas cards, food cards $600.00

*Indiegogo’s fee's $250.00

*Children’s prizes and crafts for the fall benefit $300.00


Total $3000.00


www.bofmovement.com

Here is Frankie's story:

At the age of 27, Frankie Olvera began his battle against a rare form of  cancer. Even with this devastating diagnosis he stood strong, positive, and determined to fight . 

Frankie thought he had broken his foot while running to the bus stop. Several months passed by and his foot would not heal. Searching for answers the doctor soon discovered that there was a tumor crushing the bones in his foot. He was subsequently diagnosed with a rare form of cancer called Monophasic Synovial  Sarcoma. With this diagnosis he was forced to make the first of many tough decisions; amputate his leg from the knee down and live or keep his leg and hope for the best- he chose to amputate and live.

Frankie's first surgery a month later was only the beginning. He soon had to start rigorous rounds of chemotherapy. The chemotherapy made him terribly sick, to the point that every three weeks he would spend 3-5 days in the hospital recovering. Frankie had a total of five major surgeries and multiple rounds of chemotherapy. Eventually though the cancer metastasized to his lungs.

Frankie's life was just beginning when he received his diagnosis. He had plans, dreams and a beautiful daughter he wanted to see off to college and walk down the aisle someday. He fought with all of his heart and his will to survive was immeasurable. Frankie Olvera was a son, brother, father, uncle, friend, a talented artist and musician. Frankie lost his battle on July 24, 2010.

Prior to his passing Frankie created the BOF Movement, to help others fight against cancer. Please help us continue Frankie's dream and keep the BOF going. Cancer knows no bounds and can affect anyone, our group doesn't designate itself to one specific cancer- we want to help anyone affected by cancer. Please help us keep Frankie's dream alive!

If you are not able to donate financially please share Frankie's story with all your friends and family and on social media.

story:
Jij wilt graag SUCCES met je bedrijf! In ruil daarvoor help je mij aan een TRAP. 

Ik gebruik crowdfunding om jou te helpen aan SUCCES met je bedrijf en daardoor mijn TRAP te financieren.

Herken je dat?

  • Dat je niet weet WAT je moet doen om (meer) SUCCES te hebben met je bedrijf?
  • Dat je te weinig klanten hebt en te veel uren werkt?
  • Dat je alles alleen doet en vergeet om hulp te vragen?
  • Dat je met jouw passie, ambitie en expertise veel meer moet kunnen verdienen?
Okee, dan heb ik een hele belangrijke boodschap voor je. Stap hier uit en wel onmiddelijk. Want je wordt er ongelukkig van en je zelfvertrouwen gaat er aan. EN.. laat mij je helpen! 

Wat leer ik jou?

  • Ik leer je WAT je moet doen om SUCCES te hebben met je bedrijf en je dromen waar maakt
  • Ik leer je HOE je twee keer zoveel kan doen in net zoveel tijd, of in de helft minder tijd net zoveel kan doen.
  • Ik geef je plezier en vertrouwen in het ondernemen, omdat je erkenning en voldoening krijgt van al die geweldige klanten die jij helpt.
Dat doe ik je door te helpen aan DE ultieme strategie die je helpt aan je doelgroep en ervoor zorgt dat ze je betalende klanten worden. Als jij deze strategie keer op keer toepast dan groeit jouw klantenbestand en jouw omzet. Je ontvangt al mijn favoriete systemen, tools en formats die er voor zorgen dat jouw bedrijf doorgaat, ook als jij even met vakantie gaat.

Wil jij de TRAP op? Dan heb ik ook jouw hulp nodig!

Wat is het geval? Komende week ga ik afscheid nemen van mijn huidige woning en verhuis ik naar een ander huis. Een nieuwe en fijne plek en voor mij de start van een nieuw begin. 

Er is echter nog één ding. Er moet een nieuw trap in. Deze trap kost inclusief monteren € 2500. Afgelopen donderdag vroeg ik mijn Mastermindgroep om een uitdaging: ‘Hoe kan ik mijn passie en expertise inzetten om deze trap te financieren?’ Zij kwamen met het idee een crowdfundingcampagne op te zetten, omdat de trap zo’n mooie metafoor is voor groei in je bedrijf. ‘Vraag je netwerk en je mailinglijst om een investering in jouw trap. Als dank geef jij hen een trap… omhoog.’ Snap je ’m?

Ik besloot dit te doen.

  • Omdat ik hiermee uit mijn comfortzone ga.
  • Omdat ik hiermee mijzelf uitdaag.
  • Omdat ik je hiermee wil laten zien dat je dingen gewoon moet DOEN.
  • Omdat ik hiermee jou ook kan helpen!

Want ik heb een grote PASSIE: jou helpen als ondernemer, waardoor jij succes hebt met je bedrijf. Waardoor jij een grotere bijdrage kan leveren aan het leven van jouw klanten. Rob Slijpen, één van mijn favoriete klanten is hier zo'n prachtig voorbeeld van, dat deel ik graag met je.

Crowdfunding: ik help jou en jij helpt mij.

Ga je met mij de uitdaging aan? Jij investeert in mijn trap en ik investeer in jou! Waardoor jij stappen omhoog maakt; de trap op gaat. SUCCES hebt met je bedrijf. 

Speciaal voor jou heb ik geweldige producten, trainingen en BONUSSEN ontwikkeld. Wauw, daar wordt je echt blij van.Okee, let's go!

Koop een PERK of doe een CONTRIBUTION

Om in mijn trap te investeren koop je een PERK of doe je contribution. Je betaalt met Paypal. Wil je met iDeal betalen? Ga dan naar mijn website: www.succesmetjebedrijf.nl/product-categorie/wil-je-mij-een-trap-geven/

Perk 1: Toolkit I Love My Systems: Een toolkit boordevol handige tools en formats. Deze helpen jou om je bedrijf superstrak in te richten, efficienter en sneller te werken en meer tijd AAN je bedrijf te besteden dan IN je bedrijf. De BONUS die ik hier speciaal voor heb ontwikkeld is een fantastisch IMPLEMENTATIEPLAN. Hiermee heb ik alle stappen uitgewerkt die je moet nemen om succes te hebben met je bedrijf.

Perk 2: Training ‘Meer Leven Minder Werken’. In deze training leer ik jou het leven van je dromen te realiseren. Meer doen in minder tijd. Normaal kost deze training €497, maar voor jou is deze nu €47. En als BONUS krijg je de toolkit I Love My Systems er bij inclusief het IMPLEMENTATIEPLAN. 

Perk 3: Coaching Intensive. Tijdens deze intensieve en exclusieve sessie help ik je met jouw grootste uitdaging van dit moment. Deze sessies vinden plaats in kleine groepen. We zetten samen de eerste stappen van het IMPLEMENTATIEPLAN. En als BONUS? En de Toolkit en de Training er gratis bij! Wauw, dat is ECHT onbetaalbaar!

Kies je favoriete perk in de rechterkolom en let's go for it! Ik m'n trap en jij de trap omhoog!

Je helpt me ook door mijn crowdfundingcampagne te delen in jouw netwerk en op social media. Klik hiervoor op onderstaande knoppen.

Neem NU actie!

Ik ben de uitdaging van mijn team aangegaan. Met deze crowdfundingactie ga ik mijn trap financieren en ik hou je op de hoogte van de ontwikkelingen. Daarbij vind ik het ook belangrijk je te laten zien dat je dingen gewoon moet DOEN, moet uitproberen. Dat je uit je comfortzone moet stappen en om hulp moet (durven) vragen. Ik ben je heel dankbaar voor al je hulp!

Make it a HAPPY day!
Marielle

story:
We may not reach our goal, but help us reach $5k before time runs out  >>> 53 people contributing $30 gets us there!

Why is this campaign important?

The problems of the American food system are well known. Many communities face high chronic disease rates and limited access to healthy foods. Our integrated food justice classes show teens how to address these as well as other food related issues specific to their own communities.

Everyone eats.  But not everyone eats with knowledge of how food choices affect their health, their family and their community.  By educating and involving teens in food related issues, we are creating a generation that understands and acts with knowledge.  This is why we believe that today’s teens play a crucial role in creating a fair and sustainable food system that will support healthy communities for years to come.

Our intention

Our plan is to help 25,000 high school students across the country receive hands-on learning about food systems, sustainability and justice by Labor Day 2016.  To accomplish this, we will publish our 3-day lesson, activities and worksheets and get them into the hands of talented teachers. Every $30 you contribute will give one educator the tools she needs to reach 200 students next year.

What teens are saying about the curriculum

We need your help to make these fantastic classes available in easy-to-use guides for educators nationwide. Every contribution helps. Your $20, $50, $100 or more will make a huge difference as we raise the support needed to share TEACH Farmyards nationwide.

Ways you can help: 

  • Contribute now and receive gifts in return!
  • Spread the word about #TEACHfarmyards on Facebook or Twitter. Click here for sample posts.
  • Send this campaign to your own community and tell them why this education matters to you and future generations. 

What educators & parents are saying about our classes

Meet the Team

Anita Singh - Educator & Program Developer
Nirvani Bissessar  - Educator & Director of Service Learning
Stacey Murphy  -  Educator & Program Developer 
Danielle Gaglioti - Videographer

With generous support from the team at the Youth Farm

We may not reach our goal, but help us reach $5k before time runs out  >>> 53 people contributing $30 gets us there!Why is this campaign important?The problems of the American food system are well known. Many communities face high chronic disease rates and limited access to healthy foods. Our integrated food justice classes show teens how to address these as well as other food related issues specific to their own communities.Everyone eats.  But not everyone eats with knowledge of how food choices affect their health, their family and their community.  By educating and involving teens in food related issues, we are creating a generation that understands and acts with knowledge.  This is why we believe that today’s teens play a crucial role in creating a fair and sustainable food system that will support healthy communities for years to come.Our intentionOur plan is to help 25,000 high school students across the country receive hands-on learning about food systems, sustainability and justice by Labor Day 2016.  To accomplish this, we will publish our 3-day lesson, activities and worksheets and get them into the hands of talented teachers. Every $30 you contribute will give one educator the tools she needs to reach 200 students next year.What teens are saying about the curriculum
 What we need We need your help to make these fantastic classes available in easy-to-use guides for educators nationwide. Every contribution helps. Your $20, $50, $100 or more will make a huge difference as we raise the support needed to share TEACH Farmyards nationwide.Ways you can help: 
Contribute now and receive gifts in return!
Spread the word about #TEACHfarmyards on Facebook or Twitter. Click here for sample posts.

Send this campaign to your own community and tell them why this education matters to you and future generations. 



What educators & parents are saying about our classes


Meet the TeamAnita Singh - Educator & Program DeveloperNirvani Bissessar  - Educator & Director of Service LearningStacey Murphy  -  Educator & Program Developer Danielle Gaglioti - VideographerWith generous support from the team at the Youth Farm
Thanks to Earth Day sponsors

story:
St. Paul Saturdays is a manhood, leadership and development group headquartered in Saint Louis, Missouri for African American boys ages 6 to 17

This year will  embarked on its 31st  Annual Summer College Tour to Memphis, Tennessee to include a visit to Jackson State University and the historic Piney Woods Country Life School, the largest African American boarding school in the United States. 

In 1984, after a passionate discussion between Dr. William J. Harrison, a prominent educator, and Bishop C. Garnett Henning, pastor of St. Paul A.M.E. Church, about the need for a male mentoring program in the St. Louis area, Saint Paul Saturdays was established in the basement of St. Paul A.M.E. Church. St. Paul Saturdays was founded by Dr. William J. Harrison, an educator, historian, humanitarian, and active member of St. Paul A.M.E. Church and Bishop C. Garnett Henning. Dr. Harrison, who died in June, 1994, and Bishop C. Garnett Henning strongly believed that young black men, need, desire, and deserve a chance in life.

THE # 1 QUESTION-Why take kids so young on a college tour?

Our Answer:

31 years of high school and college graduates.


Our 2015 high school graduates (3)

Michkeal L. Cross                                        Darian Thomas,                Mark Varner

The Summer College Tour is our biggest field trip of the year to celebrate academic achievement at school and expound on our expectation for every young man to attend college after graduating from high school.

The $6000 we need will cover the basic costs as follows:

• Roundtrip Charter Coach Bus

•Hotel Accommodations for 2 nights in Memphis, Tn

•Food (Bus Snacks & Group Meals)

•Historical, Cultural Landmark, and Sporting Event Admission Fees

•Indiegogo Fees

We also have some great perks to offer for your generous donation! The perks vary depending on the amount given as seen on the right side of this page.

Our campaign will run for ONLY 60 Days! You can hold us accountable for your donations and see where your money is going - we'll keep you updated through trip photos and videos along our journey!

story:
Short Summary

Contributors fund ideas they can be passionate about and to people they trust. Here are some things to do in this section:

  • Introduce yourself and your background.
  • Briefly describe your campaign and why it's important to you.
  • Express the magnitude of what contributors will help you achieve.

Remember, keep it concise, yet personal. Ask yourself: if someone stopped reading here would they be ready to make a contribution?

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • Explain how much funding you need and where it's going. Be transparent and specific-people need to trust you to want to fund you.
  • Tell people about your unique perks. Get them excited!
  • Describe where the funds go if you don't reach your entire goal.

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know the difference their contribution will make:

  • Explain why your project is valuable to the contributor and to the world.
  • Point out your successful track record with projects like this (if you have one).
  • Make it real for people and build trust.

Risks & Challenges

People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.

  • Share what qualifies you to overcome these hurdles.
  • Describe your plan for solving these challenges.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

story:
P2P is a project of a group of professionals and scientists tired of paying abusive fees and commissions when exchange money on a trips. During the last 20 years we have to travel very frequently between USA and Europe for professional reasons and as a consequence we have had to exchange USD and Euros and other currencies also very frequently . 

Each time we had to change money at the bank or money exchange office, we saw our budget decrease between 10 to 15 % .

Why? Because banks and financial institutions apply very different rates when the buy or sell money ( High rates to sell, low rates to buy) , beside the fees they also apply to the exchange services.

The conclusion is that they make a really nice business at the cost of the consumers budget.



One day, years ago, we were in Miami in a branch of one of the biggest banks of America , with the intentions of exchange 500 € to USD. Accidentally we concur with another user who wanted to change a similar amount of USD to Euros, on the line waiting for our turn we begin to talk and during the conversation , somebody says , Why we don’t exchange ourselves the currencies we need and in that way we can save also the commissions and Fees and get a fair price.   We ask the bank employee the middle market price for euro/dollar, and we decide to make the exchange directly between us at the same bank premises but without the bank intervention.

   Each of us saved , at the end,  approximately a 12% (or a total of 150 USD). Those 150 Usd would be now at the bank pocket almost for nothing, just for giving me their USD and giving him my EUR.

The bank employee was astonished to see the scene, and we left the bank with a nice smile and the satisfaction of having 150 $/€ more in our pockets.

Our goal is simple, eliminate the fees and commissions,  users have to pay for money exchange, making the exchange directly between them, in a meeting, airport, hotel or where they decide.

  We think of the volume of money exchange transactions  made daily through banks or agencies and we realized That the benefit those Institutions get for something so simple is incredible, while the users budget  decreases significantly. That affects specially professionals, students and tourists worldwide.


 



All we have explained lead us to develop the app "Person to person direct money exchange”, a system that put persons in direct contact to exchange money and currencies they need without the bank intervention and in that way save all commissions and fees.

P2p allow users to make a specific request of money , for an specific city , location , date and agenda , in a way that other users who have the need to exchange that currency , could be in contact , and coordinate all aspects of the exchange. 

  The app is equipped with advanced communications and instant message systems, Location maps , user profiles, guarantees, security measures and  agendas ready to facilitate the appointments and exchanges.


 

 The first global platform for user directly contact and exchange money. User taking control of the currency exchange market through direct cooperation.

  The application has been designed to facilitate the direct exchange of  foreign currencies between persons.

  Through this application, wherever you go, you will find out people who needs the currencies your offer or people who carry the currencies you need.

  Based on  2.0 technologies you will be in direct contact with persons who need the currencies you offer.

  The application allow users to conduct advanced multi-parameter search, by person, date, currency, appointments and agenda, country and city, etc.

  Person 2 person will save at least 10 to 15% of your budget every time you change.

  This app is equipped with special features:

  Dynamic Virtual exchange rooms to Operate and follow requests evolution,

  arrange dates, meeting points and  agendas, providing guarantees for both

  parties.

  Currency exchange rates. 

 Direct instant message system

  Location and maps

  Personal identification and security.

  Currencies validation

  Safe appointment.

  Cyber-libraries attach to mssg system.

  Equipped with integrated  advanced free communications…

  The platform and app, verify all users, ask for official documents to establish the correct identification.





P2P is the first of 54 applications and platforms we will be launching in a continuous way during the coming  months.

  All the apps have a common philosophy and  point to the same direction: defend consumers against abusive providers and methots , allow them to get transparent  information and Global operational capabilities as Global citizens, eliminate  unfair national and international structures providing advanced collaborative tools and platforms in 140 sectors and key categories like ( tangibles and raw materials, Intellectual property and innovation products and services, Education and training products and services, contents, information  and all kind of documentation , Professional,  consulting and advice services  of all kind, transport, logistic and import export control.




The cost of apps is 0, we will distribute them by free, and the hosting costs of the users contents  will be near 0 ( a symbolic cost, less than 1 € per year).

  The apps and platforms have been developed over 20 years and have also been finance by us ( the founders ) investing a big part of our money and thousands of hours.  The 95 % of the apps and platforms are already developed, but we need to generate  infrastructure , offices and staff  in America , Asia and Europe to market the applications and to garantee services to  users and the system functionality.

  We appreciate and thank you in advance for your support to our project. We want also every body to be part of it , and in that way we will give you for free the Advanced Web and Global Market apps and will keep you updated with their advances for free, to those who support the global launching of the  project  and who contribute to his release.

We also want to say that , if the funds needed and requested to achieve the goals explained could not be raised, we will continue working to market the "Person to person direct money exchange" app and platform as well as the rest of the 54 apps . We are not going to give up after 20 years working on them, with more than 100.000 asp files and DDBB developed .

  We want everybody to benefit from our technologies  by providing them  for free. The resources we need and ask for will make the difference. If we could get those financial resources, the apps will be market a lot sooner and with a stronger and more robust infrastructure to guarantee their correct functioning and success . 

  We also know by previous experiences that those apps will affect the Business plans and profits of large transnational corporations , and those corporations  are not going to remain idle... But the consumers will save thousands of millions of dollars.


Person to person Direct Money Exchange Full Dossier:

Http://www.globaluno.com/P2P_FullDossier.pdf

Person To Person Direct Money Exchange Platform and app. screenshots.





Person to person Direct Money Exchange Full Dossier:

Http://www.globaluno.com/P2P_FullDossier.pdf



The Team:



Copy Right :

story:
Work that Empowers Society's Most Vulnerable

Who:  My name is Jim Russ.  I lost my daughter, Amber, a few years ago.  She was 20 years old.  Some of our favorite things were cruising the malls in her wheelchair, bright and beautiful colors, and giving prized possessions to unknown strangers. Amber would always smile brightly in the presence of the people and things that pleased her most. Today, the company in her name continues to give as Amber’s Smile is the remaking of her life through others, especially those who may have physical challenges themselves.

What:  Very simply, Amber’s Smile produces a unique environmentally friendly tote bag system named “My Beautiful Bag.”  This creative shopping bag system blends everyday reusable shopping bags with a personalized, stylish and convenient way to carry them—making them always available and ready for use.  The highest quality fabrics assure that their beauty will be there years later. "My Beautiful Bag" includes:

  • Carry-all tote bag with customized image imprint.
  • Two medium sized interior reusable shopping bags.
  • Return-to-Car Key Clip.
  • Grocery List notepad and coupon holder.

How: Amber's Smile, LLC provides meaningful employment opportunities for many of the most vulnerable members of society; that is, adults with disabilities. To carry on in the theme of Amber’s life, “My Beautiful Bag” is customized and assembled by adults with disabilities.  The benefit is that this provides meaningful employment opportunities while developing positive revenue. 

We are proud to have these adults earn wages for assembling the “My Beautiful Bag” product. Although these workers are challenged with various special needs, each person takes part in the assembly process at a competent skill level determined by their instructor. 

Where:  The adults with disabilities who assemble the “My Beautiful Bag” shopping bag solutions work in training facilities located in Sarasota, Tampa and Fort Meyers, Florida, and Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania. The work that these individuals do helps to promote Amber’s legacy to all who love the Earth, and who care about the most vulnerable of its inhabitants—adults with disabilities. 

Why:  Your assistance will help us establish additional partnerships within other training workshop facilities enabling Amber’s Smile to employ more adults with disabilities. With your help, we can provide much needed support and reinforcement for these exceptional adults through artistic expression and creativity. Plans are underway to establish new partnerships in Florida, Georgia, Colorado and North Carolina. 


Community Haven adults with disabilities creating artwork and assembling 
"My Beautiful Bag."

How You Can Join Us and "Get Your Indiegogo On!"

  • Contribute today. Give graciously, generously, and to the fullest extent that you can. Go beyond "giving back". You’ll actually be “putting something back” in the lives of many adults with disabilities by giving a gift from the heart. Invest in their today, tomorrow, and future hopefulness.
  • Make some noise! Ask your family, friends, and co-workers to help spread the word about our Indiegogo crowdfunding campaign. Check out Indiegogo's easy to use share tools above.
  • Stay connected. Check back often as our campaign success unfolds and we talk more about the new initiatives at the training workshop facility you are helping to fund. Connect with Amber's Smile through our Website,  Facebook.

What We Need 

Our goal is to raise $300,000 in funds that will enable us to maintain partnerships with current training workshop facility contracts and establish additional partnerships within other training workshop facilities throughout the U.S.

The Impact

We believe hiring workers in training workshop facilities for adults with disabilities allows us to get to know them a bit better.  And we feel through our involvement with this population, we will impact every major city to the higher good, inspiring others to join in the movement by our actions.

With your support, by the end of the summer of 2015, we'll be working towards enhancing our current partnerships and establishing other job opportunitiesincluding assembly, installation, design, and package distribution.

Our overall goal is to enhance our ability to partner with training workshop facilities in all major U.S. cities in order to provide employment opportunities and skills training for those who need it most; that is, adults with disabilities.

On Funding

We launched this campaign for three major reasons:

(1) Raising funds to share the inspirational legacy of Amber’s Smile on behalf of a very special young lady who lived 20 years with special needs, (2) maintaining and establishing partnerships with new training workshop facilities that provide meaningful jobs and skills training for adults with disabilities, and (3) doing our part in saving the earth by manufacturing "My Beautiful Bag," an environmentally friendly shopping bag system for use by those wanting to stop using plastic bags. Without YOU, we can't do what we have set out to do! 

How to use My Beautiful Bag 

Step 1: Shop and Unpack Groceries

Step 2: Refold Bags & Attach Car Keys

Step 3: Return Tote Bag to Car


Spread the Word About Ambers Smile

Want some other ways to join the movement? We'd love for you to freely share the campaign on social media, email friends, and keep spreading the word through your daily interactions.

story:
Do a Good Deed for Someone Today..

and when you do, Give this Coin Away!"

Can you imagine doing one good deed and then having that one good deed blossom and multiply into unlimited good deeds performed all around the world for years to come? 

Designed to educate children, youth and adults, The Giving Coin Project TM invites everyone to experience personal empowerment that comes from the act of "giving to others".  Won't you join us?!  


                       


Our Educational Challenge - Empathy

Today's schools have very limited time and money to allocate for Character Values Education. Schools and society in general, struggle with self focused young people and acts of bullying on a daily basis. The core solutions to behavioral change comes from the realization of ones power to make a positive change in others lives through acts of GIVING. Discovering the joys associated with giving and helping others is truly life changing.


 

  So let's see what this simple and effective program is all about! 

Click on video below...


              

This gold "Giving Coin" is a simple catalyst as a point of contact to inspire the performance of "good deeds" by all participants.


                                            

The Giving Coin Project web site address is  imprinted on the front side of the coin and on the back side, a simple instruction:


      "Do a Good Deed for Someone Today, and

          When You Do, Give This Coin Away!"

                                       

Students document their special Good Deeds performed and create a detailed description on the Giving Coin Project web site.

  Giving Coin participants are excited about beginning their lifelong "journey of giving" with this combination of Old World and New World technology - a brass coin AND the ability to track it using the internet for countless years to come!
A true "hands on" lesson in compassion and empathy!
You can help give the GIFT OF GIVING this holiday season!


The program will initially be implemented within a structured educational or "school" environment. As coins are given away by participants, the program will expand on it's own to include people of every age, background and culture.

The Giving Coin Project is :
  •  FLEXIBLE. Defined as a "Class Project" Curriculum, the Giving Coin Project can be used in a number of ways deemed appropriate by the teacher or educator. There is no defined time structure or class schedule.
  • EASY TO UNDERSTAND AND EXECUTE. Teachers may utilize the program as a single day project, utilize our online resources or customize a curriculum to suit their individual needs.
  • FREE for both public and private schools.
Free?! So how can we give it away for free? Just like all non-profit organizations, we must communicate our needs to others to support our goodwill projects. Long term funding requirements will eventually be provided by corporate sponsors, grant requests and philanthropy.

However, this Pilot Program will be launched with contributions from our Crowd Funding Partners like you! Remember that the more successful this campaign is, the more students will be able to take part in this exciting program! The level of your giving will provide you with Perks -  or as we like to say "Thank you Gifts".



Beginning in November 2015, our Pilot Program will be introduced in 12 different schools located in 7 countries around the globe. Let us introduce you to two of our pilot school partners!


Our Uganda Pilot School:  Treasures Christian School



                   Our Chicago Area Pilot School: St. Josephs High School

   



We are excited to work with this great group of schools and students and they are anxiously awaiting to begin our program!   The map below displays our initial Pilot Program school locations around the globe. 


You can be a part of this exciting international effort by simply giving a small amount to support this campaign! Our budget for the Pilot Program is $32,000, which will be used to launch and manage the first phase of The Giving Coin Project including initial web site development, production of curriculum and custom coin minting costs. 



Your contribution will allow us to develop this exciting and powerful website to track every good deed and EVERY Giving Coin! Upon performing their "Good Deed", participants will go to our web site to permanently log their deeds and register their Giving Coin. They will then be able to monitor and track their coin's journey! They can also view resources, Good Deed idea lists, and the ability to create detailed story maps of their giving experiences.


The Giving Coin Project web site will also incorporate a sophisticated searchable database. Imagine we will be able to search and track any coin by Coin Number, Name, Location or Category for a complete list of all GOOD DEEDS performed - and detailed world maps showing history of every coin's journey!

 

              

As we all learn to understand that we can make a difference in others lives,we become more active and involved in our community! Would you help us this holiday season?

                   

 


Campaign team members, Troy and JR have written and produced many motivational and inspirational productions and have seen first hand how these programs can mold and change behaviors of youth.

           

Troy Okoniewski, Head of Production and JR Layne, President with MADD Celebrity Host Danielle Fishell

Educational Entertainment Group is an Arizona non-profit organization in good standing, and specializes in the production of unique educational media projects. Our programs are known for their unique integration of entertainment industry celebrities and properties with the creation of the nations first ever multi-screen educational touring video presentations for such clients as MADD (Mothers Against Drunk Driving). 

As you support The Giving Coin Project, you can be personally assured that you are contributing to quality educational programming that will generate countless acts of kindness  for literally years to come.

 

All funds over and above our campaign goal will immediately launch us into our  Phase Two Funding Campaign. Our first year goal is to distribute 200,000 coins around the world, and in doing so, motivate 200,000 students to begin their life's "journey in giving"!

Phase Two funding will allow further developments such as:

  • Multiple Editions of Age Appropriate Curriculum Materials.We will be developing specific age appropriate curriculum's for elementary, middle, and high school classrooms.

  • Mobile App Design and Implementation.We will use a portion of funding for the production of our "mobile app" to track every Giving Coin using their unique tracking number. Users will be able to view the entire history of each coin from the very first good deed performed including photos, videos and maps!
  •  

       

  • Expanded Media Production and Program Distribution
EEG will be creating a wide variety of media support materials including a flagship touring multi-screen video production. This unique program will be available to students internationally, and will include heart warming stories, celebrity testimonials and a contemporary music soundtrack.

                         



We have created many very nice perks for our contributors as a way of saying "Thank You" for your support of this very special program. Review the details in the column on the right side of this page.

             So place your order and select your Perk!



    Adopt a School Classroom!

    You can also provide The Giving Coin Project to a special school that YOU choose! Maybe you have an affinity toward your elementary or high school and would like to leave a legacy for your Alma Mater! We will offer the program in your name ( or anonymously if you prefer) to the school of your choosing.
    The classroom will send you a special "thank you picture" and share their experiences online for you to enjoy.

                               

                  

     
                                                          "We're Counting On You!"

     You can help create this movement of GIVING by simply giving a little yourself! Together we can support a new generation of Givers!

                                                                

                 Creating a New Generation of Givers!


    ARE THERE WAYS I CAN SUPPORT THE GIVING COIN PROJECT BEYOND THIS CAMPAIGN?

    Absolutely! This is more than just a crowdfunding campaign, it is a national movement. Yes, we need the funding, but the whole reason we even started The Giving Coin Project in the first place was to empower youth.

    You can make a tremendous contribution through sharing the link to this fundraising campaign, and tell your friends, family, colleagues and social network contacts about The Giving Coin Project!

    As we all learn to understand that we can make a difference in others lives, we become more active and involved in our community,

    Let YOUR "journey in Giving" begin today!


                          THANK YOU!

story:
‘’We don’t grow into creativity, we grow out of it. Or rather we get educated out of it.’’

Ken Robinson

Summary

Hello! My name is Kostas and I am a professor of chemistry. I am trying to raise funds in order to paint with my students a huge periodic table in the forecourt of a public school in the heart of Athens. The educational system in Greece uses old fashioned teaching methods so Ι believe that this project will sent a message to everyone that there are alternative educational methods, more creative and more efficient ones. At the same time it will be a good chance for students to express themselves, highlight their talent in a graffiti painting style and reduce the stress of exams. This project has also a very important purpose: to make school colorful and inspire other schools do something similar.

If we manage to paint the biggest periodic table in the world, made by students, we will ask for a Guinness record evaluation in order to make our work of art known to everyone.

In photos below you can see previous attempts with our own funds.


What We Need

1350 € for paints and equipment

650 € for Guinness record application

If we do not gather the whole amount, we will paint a smaller periodic table without asking for a Guinness record evaluation.

Every donation, no matter what the amount, will be a very important motive for us. For those that will contribute we will prepare and send “thank you” cards of our work with the names of all students on it.

Other Ways You Can Help

Every student who lives in Athens and loves painting can join us.

We would very much appreciate tips on graffiti painting, especially concerning the paints and the equipment that could be more efficient in such a project. Our main concern is that the graffiti proves durable throughout both winter and summer conditions.
